text: i love this place. the sushi is fantastic and fresh, and the service is good :-) It isnt too pricey either.
Family owned restaurant with good food.   Top: lunch special with tempura and sushi, comes with miso soup and ice cream.   Bottom: Okonomiyaki and karage lunch
Great place run by Japanese folks. Very good service decent portion size. Make reservations if you are here with big parties or you want the booths. Enjoy!
